entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider memoizing more CNG properties on CngKey that can't change after the key is finalized #89821
    Future
  • Native AOT libraries for iOS and Android #89817
  • Assert in System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.CompleteAcceptOperation #89806
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Method FromStream(Async) to BinaryData that does not copy #89804
  • Use BCrypt.dll for all ephemeral asymmetric operations on Windows #89798
    9.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] [Proposal] Separate cleanup stages into CleanupIn and CleanupOut #89791
  • MethodImplOptions.Flatten? #89789
    Future
  • [Question/.NET 7] limitation of RSACryptoServiceProvider, unable to give right to a specific user #89786
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `[System.IO.Path]` method to ensure that a relative path stays inside a directory #89785
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException constructor with actualValue and system message #89783
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: "www.microsoft.com") #89779
  • [API Proposal]: `Task<T>.CastUp` #89778
  • Cannot connect to a sql database using system.data.sqlclient and native aot win 64 publish #89782
  • Large number of memfd:doublemapper (deleted) entries #89776
  • Plain struct not copied correctly when passed to method under certain conditions #89774
  • Uri doesn't expose the original, user-provided port value #89768
    Future
  • Comparers don't work for messy generic corner cases #89767
  • Breaking change in WebAssembly loadBootResource #89766
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #89794
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #89793
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int16 #89790
  • Earlier version can not build #89765
  • Building ILC causes double writes in the runtime build #89763
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 7/26/2023 12:02:55 AM #89796
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple UserSecretIds for shared secret accross mutliple local repositories #89761
    Future
  • Test failure: readytorun/crossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2.sh #89756
  • HttpClientFactory support for keyed DI #89755
    8.0.0
  • FileFlagNoBuffering is still busted (this time for Writing) #89750
    Future

Closed

  • Configuration-binding source generator: Binding logic was not generated for a binder call #89732
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when the managed signature returns an int, enum, or type alias for int #89315
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_do/pinvokes_do #87388
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isActive == false' #87511
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((regArgMaskLive & RBM_FLTARG_REGS) == 0) && "Homing of float argument registers with circular dependencies not implemented."' #87515
    8.0.0
  • Span<byte> from local variable bug in .net 7.x Release #89666
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator does not work unless Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions is referenced #86653
    Future
  • Configuration binding source generator doesn't handle generics correctly #89273
    8.0.0
  • Audit how we surface diagnostics from the config binding generator and how users might suppress them #88865
    8.0.0
  • R2R jobs should not pass -O to crossgen2 #56148
    8.0.0
  • ReadyToRun (crossgen2) should respect the debuggable and optimization attributes of the assembly #67541
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 experiments: container performance and density #77517
    8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 work for .NET 8 #85736
    8.0.0
  • Four crossgen-comparison jobs are failing regularly in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 outerloop runs #74842
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http2.Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled_InfiniteRequestsCompletelyBlockOneConnection_RemaningRequestsAreHandledByNewConnection #45204
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http2.Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled_ConnectionLimitNotReached_ConcurrentRequestsSuccessfullyHandled #41078
    8.0.0
  • Please backport fix for #84994 (via PR #85001) to .NET 7 #87791
    7.0.x
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 59 Regressions due to PGO update #87179
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm debugging with a proxy #88051
    Future
  • Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in base type is getting ignored by runtime in context of derived type #76673
    8.0.0
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store fails with a PrincipalOperationException after any successful call to ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store #83269
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_ConnectCallback_Http2.ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success - Exception #73772
    8.0.0
  • ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull doesn't throw on Blazor client (Mono interpreter) #89751
  • BinClashes for Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.dll #84157
    8.0.0
  • Make non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #83495
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.MatchType.Regex #89760
    Future
  • InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code (in-the-wild observation) #89746
  • Regressions in System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process on 2/17/2023 #82439
    8.0.0
  • IOS CultureInfo does not contain NativeName #75927
    8.0.0
  • Getting No Names in regioninfo class on IOS #70028
    8.0.0
  • Add CreateParameter() method (and CanCreateParameter) to DbBatchCommand #82326
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-collect fails with "module 'asyncio' has no attribute 'get_running_loop'" #89618
  • Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #83514
    8.0.0
  • JIT: RBO still introduces data races #78713
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #88671
    8.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress does not working properly #83869
  • use filestream write data to linux drive file err #82928
  • AesCryptoServiceProvider #85974
  • Investigate limitations and document findings of enabling NativeAOT for MAUI iOS application #80907
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make SocketAddress more useful #86872
    8.0.0
  • Update trimming tests to use live-built ILLink.Targets logic #88624

PullRequests

Created

  • Make test `HugeField2` optimization sensitive for ARM32 #89824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve enum parsing in config binder generator #89823
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds #89822
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Don't access AlgorithmGroup until necessary #89819
    area-System.Security
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #89815
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #89814
    area-codeflow
  • Adjust DNS metrics #89813
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Adjust System.Net.Http metrics #89809
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocating SocketAddress GCHandle for every ReceiveFromAsync #89808
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Update prepare-artifacts.proj #89803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try Vector128 before Vector #89797
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix COM object leak #89795
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.x
  • Change www.microsoft.com to www.github.com in test #89792
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch #89781
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono]: Align GetProcessinfo3 diagnostics command for MacCatalyst. #89780
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Consistently use '0x' as the hex specifier #89773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix analysis issue in LDTOKEN dependencies #89757
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Trigger native build when some properties have a different value than the runtime pack #89754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't have getVectorTByteLength() return 0 for the time being #89802
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't dead store untracked OSR locals based on ref count #89743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.11 #89801
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.11
  • Update branding to 6.0.22 #89800
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.22
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reenable Deserialize test for GCStress #89770
    area-Serialization
  • Improve HTTP/2 MultipleConnectionsEnabled tests #89788
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #88884
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix COM object leak #89745
    area-System.DirectoryServices, 8.0.0
  • Longer timeouts for perf slow jobs #89762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test #89748
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add workaround for broken SPNEGO in IBM WebSphere #89268
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Add support for running WBT with multithreaded runtime installed too #89611
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Enable sourcelink for native bits on MSVC #89777
    area-Build-mono
  • Temporarily increase timeouts for perf jobs, because of limited capacity in "ubuntu.1804.amd64.tiger.perf" queue. #89764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add missing namespace to CreateParameter() #89775
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Add CreateParameter() to DbBatchCommand #89503
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors by GCC. #89753
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [iOS] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: Fix RBO introducing data races #89710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix building with GVM_RESOLUTION_TRACE #89758
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Add top level statement trimming tests #89606
    area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89689
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [wasm] Remove hardcoded references to `net8.0` from WasmApp*targets #89699
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Run the tests in debug mode to get more information. #89737
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2233996 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Mono]: Fix iOS/Android sample diagnostics config. #89725
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Guaranteed unmarshal before managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser] fix loading assets #89687
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not pause on exceptions from our framework js files if JMC is enabled #89741
    area-Debugger-mono
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle managed exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #89532
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [IGNORE] Investigate returning ConnectionError instead NameResolution #89260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Utilize the new `ref readonly` language feature #89736
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT: Quote whole commands to make it easier to consume linker args by Xamarin #88294
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Assure name starts with `icudt` + fix testing scenario. #89719
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix deadlock during gcdump when using interp full AOT fallback. #89726
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #89673
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimization setting is not passed to the linker #2357

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Delete the no-longer-needed casts in `cpobj` code #2352
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Init callback declaration #2364
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run` help doesn't show help about `--urls` #34386
  • Add an opt-out msbuild property for making non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #34365

Closed

  • 无法安装 Unable to install #29728
  • How does workload versioning work? #25089
  • Error Installing dotnet-sdk on Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS #24877
  • A question about System.Numerics. #24574
  • `TargetOutputs` is empty after building another project with `MSBuild` task #23252
  • Reintroduce a single variable param -p for projects on "dotnet run" #22792
  • template does not support file scoped namespace declaration #22503
  • dotnet build error "Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.DotNet.PlatformAbstractions" #22675
  • Improve workloads versioning #22151
    Backlog
  • .NET CLI: dotnet command output formatting #21142
    Discussion
  • Proposal: cleaning up `publish` UX #15726
    Discussion
  • Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project Constructor throws an exception when dotnet sdk 5.0.100 is installed. #14711
  • Is Xamarin.Android support SqlDependency? #14709
  • project.assets.json file is missing dependencies for Project References when restored. #14688
  • Unlisted packages are still installed via `dotnet tool install` without `--version` despite correctly not showing up in `dotnet tool search` #24037
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Change prerelease label to servicing #34385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34379
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #34378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #34377
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34144
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34143
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • [Containers] validate that the normalized repository name is a meaningful name #34286
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.11
  • Update branding to 7.0.111 #34370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.414 #34369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.317 #34368
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.122 #34367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.308 #34371
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.401 #34372
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse User and Port Container Metadata from special environment variables #34154
    Area-Containers
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951

Updated

  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First pass at adopting CPM #34344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • When Hot Reload change fails to apply in the browser send full error … #33471
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Don't set UseApphost or SelfContained to true for PublishAot #33229
    Area-External, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • `modreq(In)` is not emitted for `in` parameters of delegate `Invoke` #7366

Updated

  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350
  • Create spec for lambda params with by-ref modifiers without type name #7369

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve places where CS1661 is reported #69322
  • EnC: Emit trampoline for deleted property that shadows primary parameter #69317
  • IDE0058 suggestion: option to specify a whitelist of methods to ignore #69315
  • Native AOT build fails on Ubuntu 22.04 and Clang 14.0.0-1ubuntu1.1 with error : cannot find -lstdc++: No such file or directory #69314
  • IDE0046 suggestion: option to ignore else-if statements #69312
  • IDE0022 suggestion: option to ignore methods with where clause #69310

Closed

  • CS0612 in generated code cannot be supressed in editorconfig #69298
  • No `modreq(In)` emitted for synthesized delegate `Invoke` method #69079
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Simplify Type Names LSP Method #69323
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for converting existing collection-initializers over to collection expressions. #69321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tests for missing scenarios #69320
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use SyntaxFactory.IdentifierName to create an instance of SyntaxNode instead of SyntaxToken (#38311) #69318
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • A better descriptor Id for an F# analyzer #69313
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warnings for collection initializers #69307
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Bump Razor to 7.0.0-preview.23375.1 #69306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for quick info in embedded languages #69303
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add test to make sure option names won't change #69319
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • F1 help for `#if` and `#else` refers to preprocessor symbols, not `if_CSharpKeyword` and `else_CSharpkeyword` #69192
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for ReadOnlySpan<T> argument to builder method #69227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Consistently use UICulture instead of Culture #69305
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use "Working Set" instead of "C# Next" for working set section #69302
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Configure Binskim to look for symbols on MS symbols server #69311
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Enable bootstrapped builds in VS test insertion YAML #69130
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Workaround vsix deployment issue in local build #69266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update ref safety #69291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Add support for generating the `.. x ? [y] : []` pattern in a collection-expression #69280
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • SyntaxGenerator handle explicit interface indexer #69285
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix auto-default behavior when value-assigning a ref field #69283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report generator failures when emitting solution updates #68170
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.9
  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check fo both csharp and visualbasic in IsCSharpOrVisualBasicSuperSet #69271
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR-Client-Cpp will not compile with gcc 13 #49784
  • Perf regression: json #49782
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #49781
  • [blazor wasm] dotnet watch - System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity. #49780
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using token [action] or [controller] in [Http*] or [Route] attributes #49777

  • Incompatible with UI client as angular version 16 with module federation plugin #49775
  • Missing workload check causes error for WasmLinkerTest project #49774

Closed

  • RequestDelegateFactoryTests migration #47345
    8.0-preview6
  • Support for x-forwarded-prefix #23263
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49767
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335

  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48461
    8.0-rc1

  • Jscall blazor ssr .net 8-p6 closed connection #49665

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable navigation when RenderModeServer #49768
    area-blazor
  • Rename SignalR transport metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49766

Merged

  • Remove standard keyword #49700
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249

    area-networking, 8.0-rc1
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces references #49716
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Use Https instead of Http in InstallNode scripts #49764
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF/CR/LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Re-run routing for implicit middlewares that require endpoints #49732
    area-security, area-minimal, area-middleware
  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2233723 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Rename Kestrel metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49747
    area-runtime
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename rate limiting middleware metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49749
    area-middleware
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Rename hosting, routing and error handling metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49743
    area-hosting
  • Add Keyed DI support to SignalR #49729
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView in ShellFlyoutContent inverts item layout direction in WinUI #16483
  • [iOS] SearchBar Cancel button and searching for an empty string does not trigger the SearchCommand #16480
  • Animation CallBack action not invoked when enabled the battery-saver in Android device. #16478
  • FadeTo not completing on Samsung devices with visibility enhancement "Remove animations" turned on #16476
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [Windows] `WidthRequest="0"` in `Grid` crashes the app #16475
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add DataPackageOperation.Move option for Drag & Drop #16472
  • Shell tab bar overflows the content of the page when navigating back through swipe [iOS] #16471
  • Maui migrating Xamarin to Maui - Tabbed Page Scroll Issue - Tabs are not scrolling #16470
  • XAML can't find outer converter and fails to build #16468
  • Appended ToolbarHandler mapper action not called on iOS #16467
  • XAML Schemas Namespace Customization Not Supported Without 'x:Name' Declaration #16466
  • When I use MVVN binding a property , and use a thread to update this property value. This property value has been changed in the code,but in UI not changed! #16465
  • MaximumHeightRequest property of ScrollView is incorrect on Android. #16464

Closed

  • Colors correct on simulator but incorrect on device #16482
  • Invalid URI: The Uri string is too long. - NET MAUI #16434
    Backlog
  • ContentPage gradient issue on iOS/MacCatalyst #15128
    Under Consideration
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 Android crashes with System.MissingMethodException #16166
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16488
  • Fix BlazorWebView tests on Windows #16487
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [SourceGen] Support genric types from XML namespaces #16486
    area/Xaml </>
  • [testing] Make test by default on 16.4 #16479
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [uitests] Skip a couple of more Compatibility UITests #16477
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16473

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Add latest versions to bug template #16484
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, Task
  • Reinstate IContentView and ILayout methods #16411
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [net8.0] Make UpdateBackground public #16453
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Remove the old step for vs insertion on release #16457
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Locate MAUI VIew for PlatformView #16463
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [WinUI] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Fix EntryCellRenderer to use FromHandler for text changes #16462
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
